verbose_text: Our results further showed that c-Myc overexpression also decreases accumulation of intracellular ferrous iron in brusatol treated cancer cells under hypoxia by increasing mitochondrial ROS, thereby reducing brusatol induced colorectal cancer cell death under hypoxia.
evidence: c-Myc overexpression also decreases accumulation of intracellular ferrous iron in brusatol-treated cancer cells under hypoxia                                      by increasing mitochondrial ROS                                     , thereby reducing brusatol-induced colorectal cancer cell death
